thread.title: Clinton Campaign Manager Urges Release of Russia Report: The ‘Public Needs To Know’
thread.title_full: Clinton Campaign Manager Urges Release of Russia Report: The ‘Public Needs To Know’

author: Lindsey Ellefson
title: Clinton Campaign Manager Urges Release of Russia Report: The ‘Public Needs To Know’
text:
Clinton Campaign Manager Urges Release of Russia Report: The ‘Public Needs To Know’ by Lindsey Ellefson | 9:59 am, January 6th, 2017 
Hillary Clinton ‘s former campaign manager Robby Mook has stayed largely silent since the election, only popping back into the public eye for a quick chat with Jake Tapper during which he decried Russian involvement in the election. 
Today, he tweeted for the first time since November 8. The tweet was a call for reports related to the alleged Russian involvement to be made public quickly. This report should be released asap with few redactions as possible. Public needs to know extent of Russia’s role https://t.co/W4meLa3Mc1 
— Robby Mook (@RobbyMook) January 6, 2017 
President-elect Donald Trump has publicly brushed off similar reports. 
Read more about the report he believes the “public needs to know” about here . 
[image: screengrab] 

This is an opinion piece. The views expressed in this article are those of just the author. Follow Mediaite
